title: Full Stack Software Engineer
text: Designed and developed a comprehensive learning platform that offers a wide range of professional IT courses. This platform is tailored to individuals seeking to advance their careers in the field of Information Technology. Through my expertise, I created an interactive and engaging environment that provides in-depth knowledge and practical skills necessary for success in the IT industry. My dedication to creating a user-friendly interface and incorporating the latest industry trends ensures that learners have access to cutting-edge resources and valuable insights.

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
text: Engaged with product management for requirements analysis and clarifications, Evaluated alternative approaches and presented recommendations to teams and unit leadership, Produced high-quality code artifacts that conformed to standards and best practices, Led technical team to meet project deadlines and attain project objectives.

title: Software Development Mentor
text: Empowering a team of aspiring software developers, help them to resolve current issues and develop coping strategies for the future. Provide a model for a healthy, trusting relationship through clear communication and setting appropriate boundaries. Acknowledging their strengths, talents and gifts and encouraging mentess to find ways to use them and also act as an active listener and offer support and encouragement when appropriate.

title: Front-end Developer
text: Reviewed and made refinements in existing programs to improve techniques, Designed tools and scripts to provide support to projects as per requirements, Reviewed information and elements regularly on websites and pages for accuracy and functionality, Reviewed project specifications and devised solutions for use across multiple websites, Validated code for proper structuring, security and compatibility with different browsers, devices or operating systems.

title: Front-end Developer
text: Created successful websites that met requirements for objectives such as load speed and design, Researched and tracked new web technologies to enhance applications, Completed design projects to meet budget, equipment, performance and legal requirements, Supported continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies for review.
